about: Hello, A Warm Welcome to my portfolio. My name is Pransu Yadav. I'm a full stack web developer and a Final Year student currently pursuing B Tech in Computer Engineering at NIT Kurukshetra. I have successfully developed and collaborated on projects consisting of small & large size teams of professionals. I thrive in fast-paced environments and have shown to drive measurable results. I am passionate about leveraging technology to solve real-world problems and look forward to applying my skills and knowledge to drive innovation in your company. My hobbies include photography and playing table tennis.
